dysentery.description: Dysentery takes your party, causing many of them to fall ill. It spreads wildly and greatly affects the health of your party.

whooping cough.death_message: {victim} did not recover from whooping cough and died.

measles.description: Several of your part members aquire measles. It quickly spreads to everyone.

soldier.description: {victim} falls behind from the group. An angry soldier shoots at him to incenitize faster movement.
soldier.death_message: {victim} was killed by a soldier for being too slow.

bears.description: {victim}'s food attracts a hungry bear. The bear attacks {victim}
bears.death_message: {victim} was mauled by an angry brown bear.
